Golmar Sistemas de ComunicaciÃ³n S.A. was set up in 1954, and one year later it manufactured its first intercom. The first door intercom was developed in 1958, followed some years later by the video door intercom, which is nowadays the most important product. More recently, based on its wide commercial network within Spain, it has expanded to the imports and sales of closed circuit TV and public address systems.

Exports began in 1968 and today account for over 30% of the company’s production.
